reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two nights at Relais de Broceliande and overall were very pleased with everything. Our room, a superior, was on the second floor and was very bright and nicely decorated. The bathroom consisted of a very modern Jacuzzi bath and separate shower. The toilet was in a separate room. Breakfast was good, croissants, fruit, soft boiled eggs. Dinner was very regional and nicely presented. As we were demi pension we had the appropriate menu the first night and paid extra the second night to enjoy the top choices. The staff were very good and cheerful. If we are in the area again we would certainly not hesitate to stay there again.
reviews.title: A good place to stopover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were travelling with a small dog and the the dog was very welcome in this place, We paid extra for it, but this is normal almost everywhere.
reviews.title: Great location to discover Bretagne
Ideal for a relaxing break
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. We arrived during a weekend and the place was full. We got a very nice room, but regrettably the shower was blocked and not working properly.
We informed this in the reception, but that first day nothing happened, all staff was very busy attending the restaurant which was fully booked during that Saturday evening.
reviews.title: Just came to hav a drink and eat in the restaurant

reviews.text: But on Sunday we've got an upgraded room with bath tub!
reviews.title: Nicely renovated and excellent food
